original_title: Man found dead in spa at Kandana
original_body_lines: A 42-year old man was found dead at a spa in the Kandana area.
Police said the deceased, a resident of Kandana was identified as a married person.
He had arrived at the spa at midnight yesterday and was found dead early this morning.
Police suspect that he might have died due to a heart attack and the Kandana Police are conducting further investigations into the incident.
